column4: can anyone help me i am trying to flash my bios using freedos but i have no floppy don't want lectures the disks are not sold here anymore nobody carries them
i installed freedos on a cd and it works and my bios update file is on there but i don't see it from freedos
does your bios support USB-booting? you can make a bootable USB with freedos and the required flashing program and files ...
well you need to look in the BIOS-menu .. to see if there's a option for botting of USB ... or in the manual of the mainbaord
